title: Create New Product Successfully
description: Verify that an admin user can create a new product with valid details including category, brand, inventory, and specifications.

steps.description: Log in to admin dashboard with valid admin credentials
Navigate to 'Add Product' page
Input all required product fields with valid data: name, category, brand, price, inventory, images, and specifications
Submit the new product form
Verify that the product is saved in the database and appears in the product list
Verify the product can be searched and filtered on the public shop page

title: Edit Existing Product Details
description: Check if an admin can update product details such as price, inventory, or description and changes persist accurately.

steps.description: Log in to admin dashboard with admin credentials
Navigate to the existing product's edit page
Modify product price, inventory count, and description fields
Submit the updated product form
Verify the updated product details are saved and visible in the product list
Verify the updated details are reflected on the public product detail page

title: Delete Product from Inventory
description: Ensure that an admin can delete a product and the product is removed from all listings and user favorites.

steps.description: Log in as admin
Navigate to product management in admin dashboard
Select a product and perform delete operation
Confirm product is removed from the database
Verify product no longer appears in shop or favorites for any user

title: Persistent Shopping Cart Functionality
description: Validate that the shopping cart preserves added products, quantities, and changes persist across sessions and page reloads.

steps.description: Visit the shop page and add multiple products with different quantities to the cart
Verify added items show correctly in the cart with accurate quantities
Reload the page or close and reopen the browser, then revisit the cart
Verify cart content remains intact with saved products and quantities
Update quantity of an item and remove another
Confirm cart updates reflect the changes immediately and persist on reload

title: Add and Remove Product from Favorites
description: Test that authenticated users can add a product to favorites and remove it, with favorites persisting across sessions.

steps.description: Log in as a registered user
Navigate to product detail and add the product to favorites
Verify the product appears in the favorites list
Remove the product from favorites
Verify the product is no longer in the favorites list
Log out and log back in
Verify favorites persist correctly for the user

title: Advanced Product Search and Filtering
description: Verify functionality of searching products by keywords and filtering by categories, brands, and price ranges returns accurate results.

steps.description: Navigate to shop page
Input search terms matching product names and keywords
Verify displayed results match the search criteria
Apply category and brand filters
Verify the product list updates accordingly showing only relevant products
Apply price range filter
Verify products displayed fall within the selected price range
Clear all filters and verify the full product list returns

title: Dynamic Page Creation and Ordering
description: Validate that admins can create dynamic pages with hierarchical structure and ordering which appear correctly on the public site.

steps.description: Log in as admin
Navigate to dynamic page management section
Create multiple pages with titles and set parent-child hierarchy
Set page display order for sibling pages
Verify pages are listed correctly with hierarchy in admin dashboard
Access the public site and navigate to created pages
Verify pages load correctly following the defined order and hierarchy

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Check that role-based access control and Row-Level Security restricts data and operations properly for different user roles.

steps.description: Attempt to access admin dashboard as unauthenticated user
Verify access is denied and user is redirected appropriately
Log in as a regular user (non-admin)
Try to perform admin functions such as product CRUD via UI and API calls
Verify all admin functions are blocked for this user role
Log in as admin and perform product CRUD successfully
Verify full access to admin features
Test accessing another admin's restricted data via API
Verify Row-Level Security prevents unauthorized data access

title: WhatsApp Checkout Integration
description: Verify that initiating checkout from the cart generates the correct order data and opens WhatsApp chat with prefilled order message.

steps.description: Add multiple products to the cart with varying quantities
Navigate to the cart page
Click the WhatsApp checkout button
Verify the WhatsApp window or link opens with message containing detailed order information (products, quantities, prices)
Verify the message format is clear and accurate representing the cart content

title: Admin Dashboard Full Functionality
description: Validate that all admin dashboard features including product, category, featured product, and page management work correctly and data updates reflect promptly.

steps.description: Log in with admin credentials
Navigate through Admin Products, Categories, Featured Products, and Pages sections
Perform create, update, and delete operations in each section
Verify data is updated instantly and accurately on UI and backend
Check for proper validation and error messages on invalid inputs

title: Routing System Navigation and Security
description: Test that routing correctly separates public and admin areas ensuring no unauthorized permissions or leaks occur.

steps.description: Access various public pages like Home, Shop, Product Detail, About, and Contact
Verify pages load correctly and UI components render properly
Attempt to navigate directly to admin URLs without authentication
Verify redirection to login page or access denied message
Log in as admin and verify access to admin routing paths
Verify successful navigation between admin subpages without errors or permission issues
Verify non-existent routes display a 404 not found page

title: Analytics Dashboard Accuracy
description: Ensure store performance and sales metrics in the analytics dashboard accurately reflect underlying data and update dynamically.

steps.description: Log in as admin
Navigate to Analytics Dashboard
Verify displayed sales, revenue, product performance, and user metrics match database contents
Perform product sales and order activities impacting analytics
Verify analytics update accordingly to reflect recent sales and changes

title: Responsive UI and Accessibility Check
description: Validate that UI components render correctly across different devices and screen sizes and meet accessibility standards.

steps.description: Open public and admin pages on desktop, tablet, and mobile viewport sizes
Verify layout adjusts responsively without breaking elements or functionality
Check all interactive elements are keyboard navigable and accessible
Verify color contrast and ARIA attributes follow accessibility guidelines

title: Error Handling and Invalid Input Validation
description: Test how the system handles invalid inputs during product creation, login attempts, and cart operations with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Attempt to create a new product with missing mandatory fields or invalid data types
Verify validation messages appear clearly and form submission is blocked
Attempt login with incorrect credentials multiple times
Verify error message for invalid login is displayed and rate limiting or lockout applies after repeated attempts
Add invalid quantity (e.g., negative number) to cart
Verify error message appears and cart does not update with invalid data
